sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Grave and Cemetery Restoration Act.

sections.heading: The presiding officer of the county board, with the advice and
sections.text:
consent of the county board may appoint some suitable person to have charge
of such work of restoration, who shall report his activities to the county
board from time to time as it may direct, and shall receive no compensation
for his services.
